name: JBox Web :: Free Projects
body:
Who we are?
===========
A french Web Agency, based in Marseille www.jbox-web.com.

Why this page?
==============
Because at JBox Web we do love Free (Open Source) projects, we try to contribute here, by publishing the source code of the tools we develop or improve for our use.

* [Django Gearman JBox][django-gearman-jbox]
* [Redmine JQuery Colorbox] [redmine-jquery-colorbox]
* [Redmine Git Hosting (current)][redmine-git-hosting-current] (working with Redmine 1.x and 2.x)
* [Redmine Git Hosting (beta)][redmine-git-hosting-beta] (working with Redmine 2.x only)
* [Nested form][nested-form]
* [Gitolite][gitolite]
* more to come...

[django-gearman-jbox]: http://jbox-web.github.io/django-gearman-jbox/
[redmine-jquery-colorbox]: http://jbox-web.github.io/redmine_jquery_colorbox/
[redmine-git-hosting-current]: http://jbox-web.github.io/redmine_git_hosting/
[redmine-git-hosting-beta]: http://n-rodriguez.github.io/redmine_git_hosting
[nested-form]: http://jbox-web.github.io/nested_form
[gitolite]: http://jbox-web.github.io/gitolite
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
